sql: SELECT MIN(mc.note) AS production_note, MIN(t.title) AS movie_title, MIN(t.production_year) AS movie_year FROM company_type AS ct, info_type AS it, movie_companies AS mc, movie_info_idx AS mi_idx, title AS t WHERE ct.kind = 'production companies' AND it.info = 'bottom 10 rank' AND mc.note  not like '%(as Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Pictures)%' AND t.production_year between 2005 and 2010 AND ct.id = mc.company_type_id AND t.id = mc.movie_id AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id AND mc.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id AND it.id = mi_idx.info_type_id;
hint_str:
/*+ HashJoin(t mi_idx ct mc it)
 HashJoin(mi_idx ct mc it)
 MergeJoin(mi_idx ct mc)
 HashJoin(ct mc)
 BitmapScan(t)
 BitmapScan(mi_idx)
 IndexScan(ct)
 BitmapScan(mc)
 IndexScan(it)
 Leading((t ((mi_idx (ct mc)) it))) */
